name: Gin & Tonic
description: A product of British colonial history, the Gin & Tonic was born in the 19th century as a medicinal measure against malaria, thanks to the quinine found in tonic water. Today, it stands as a quintessential cocktail that perfectly balances the herbaceous character of gin with the bitter-sweet profile of tonic water. Garnished with a slice of lemon or lime, this simple yet elegant drink is a testament to the beauty of two-component cocktails.
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice cubes, pour the gin, then top with tonic.
Gently stir to combine, but not so much so that you lose carbonation.
